user.title: Welcome to Green Shift
user.description:
This integration helps you monitor and optimize your home's energy efficiency. 
Click **Next** to begin setup.

settings.title: Energy Configuration
settings.description: Please provide your local currency and current electricity cost per kWh to calculate savings.

sensor_confirmation.title: Sensor Validation
sensor_confirmation.description: We found **{discovered_count}** compatible sensors. Please review the classification below to ensure calculation accuracy.

data_description.main_total_energy_sensor: If available, select the sensor that measures the TOTAL accumulated energy for the whole building. If not, leave this field empty.
data_description.main_total_power_sensor: If available, select the sensor measuring the TOTAL instantaneous power draw (Watts). If not, leave this field empty.
data_description.confirmed_energy: Select all sub-devices measuring kWh (e.g., washing machine, smart plugs).
data_description.confirmed_power: Select all sub-devices measuring instantaneous Watts.
data_description.confirmed_temp: Select sensors used to monitor indoor ambient temperature.
data_description.confirmed_hum: Select sensors used to monitor indoor relative humidity.
data_description.confirmed_lux: Select sensors used to measure light levels (Lux).
data_description.confirmed_occ: Binary sensors used to determine if a room is currently occupied.

area_assignment.title: Area Assignment
area_assignment.description:
We are tracking **{count}** sensors. Please assign each sensor to the specific room where it is installed.

This is **critical** for accurate analysis (e.g., separating the Kitchen from the Living Room).

intervention_info.title: Setup Complete
intervention_info.description: Green Shift is now configured! The system will start collecting data immediately. You can now add the Dashboard card to your Lovelace view.
